TEXT.BODY: Shr 22 cts vs 12 cts Net 3,243,000 vs 1,656,000 Revs 28.4 mln vs 21.5 mln NOTE: All amts reflect 3-for-2 stock split of company's common in form of 50 pct stock dividend paid Feb 26, 1987. Reuter
